SAMPLES.DESCRIPTION: The result will look like this if the call was successful.

PARAMETERS.NAME: contactID
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: The ContactID to add the note to.

PARAMETERS.NAME: contactNote
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: The note to add to the Contact.

PARAMETERS.NAME: noteTypeID
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: The type of note to add to the Contact. This defaults to System Note

PARAMETERS.NAME: emailNote
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: A list of ContactIDs to email the note to.

DESCRIPTION: Adds a note against a specific Contact.
